definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: The outlook on love and marriage is an important part of young people's outlook on life.
sentences.chinese: 婚戀觀是人生觀的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: FOR as long as humans have romanced each other, others have wanted to meddle.
sentences.chinese: 只要人類存在婚戀行爲，外人就想加以干涉。

sentences.english: But their concepts of love and marriage are surprisingly alike.
sentences.chinese: 但是，她們的婚戀觀有着驚人的相似之處。

sentences.english: Escape and rebellion is the main feeling style in the marriage and love stories of Wusi.
sentences.chinese: 逃離與抗爭是“五四”婚戀小說主要涉及的主題。

sentences.english: A lot of people head into courtship looking for fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 許多人進入婚戀場所尋找一種感覺。

sentences.english: Marriage atmosphere surrounded by these men from the North.
sentences.chinese: 婚戀氣息包圍着這些來自北國的男人。

definition: lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched/roughly comparable (opponents)
socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
